top_comments.comment: If I have my labradoodle lie on my bed that adds texture, right?

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hi Nick, I'm a believer of Feng Shui, no mirrors in the bedroom.

What are you thoughts on putting a rug over carpet? I love the look of having a rug grounding the bed, but I go back and forth on doing it in our master because I feel silly putting a rug over carpet.

I just want full size sheets that have bottom sheets fit tightly. The old cotton ones I have are the only ones I have found to fit with no wrinkles for my feet to avoid. Ps. I have my shag rug from living room under my bed. On its way out😁
